scripts.test:unit: node --no-warnings -e "const fs=require('fs');const p=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('package.json'));delete p.type;fs.writeFileSync('package.json',JSON.stringify(p,null,2))" && moon test -p internal/app/model; node --no-warnings -e "const fs=require('fs');const p=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('package.json'));p.type='module';fs.writeFileSync('package.json',JSON.stringify(p,null,2))"
